transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji?
Customer: Sir, good morning, Diptika baat kar rahi hu India Mart head office se, Azad sir baat kar rahe hai?
Executive: Haan, kaha se baat kar rahe hai?
Customer: India Mart head office se Diptika baat kar rahi hu sir.
Executive: Haan, Diptika ji.
Customer: Haan ji sir, aapne kal hamare customer care pe call kara tha, by list me koi problem aa rahi hai, by list receive nahi ho rahi thi thik se.
Executive: Haan, haan, wo mera wo brother hai, wo kar liya tha, chota brother hai mera.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: To ye jo last ke 318 hai usme connect karna hai sir?
Executive: Nahi, usme bhi kar liya hai.
Customer: Konse number pe?
Executive: 63 hoga piche.
Customer: 63 hai na, sir unhone connect kar liya tha, unhone time diya, unhone time pe unhe baar connect kar lenge, thik hai?
Executive: Haan, okay, okay.
Customer: Thik hai, thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- By list receive nahi ho rahi thi thik se.



Resolution:

- Customer's brother resolved the by list issue.

- Customer confirmed the last digits of the contact number are 63.



Next Steps: 

Issue not resolved. Customer care will connect at the time provided.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

by list, customer care, connect
